Node.definition: = man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

= town, also known as Mizpeh (מִצְפֶּה) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ◄ location where Israel assembled after the atrocity that was committed in Gibeah (גִּבְעָה) location where Israel assembled during the time of Samuel (שְׁמוּאֵל) leadership; residence of governor Gedaliah (גְּדַלְיָהוּ) after the destruction of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= town and cult centre, also referred to as Beth Aven (בֵּית אָוֶן) or simply Aven (אָוֶן) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) near the border of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to lift up (one's) voice = action by which humans speak with a loud voice

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= state in which an event has a high intensity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which humans or animals notice that someone or something that is expected to be present or available is missing

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= the day following the present day or another day in focus
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which part of an object is violently removed from a larger unit, with the help of a sharp object, so that it falls to the ground

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

m.definition: = area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

Node.gloss: to count|to number|to muster|to hold a roll call
Node.definition: = action by which humans carefully observe a relatively large group of people or objects, ► with the purpose of determining their number, establishing whether everyone is present, or, in the case of an army, to get to know their fighting strength

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

m.definition: = area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.definition: = the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

= children dependent on their mothers for care; ≈ in this sense usually occurring in a variant of the expression טַף וְנָשִׁים children and women, often with possessives, indicating their belonging to families headed by an adult male; ≈ associated with vulnerability and lack of strength
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= person or animal belonging to the male sex
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= rock; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

= state in which a nation is incomplete in number ◄ in the same way as a town wall with a gap in it is incomplete
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which humans, animals, plants, or objects remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

Node.gloss: to destroy|to exterminate|to wipe out|to demolish

= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= woman as a social class, to be distinguished from the men and the children

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= an area that has become someone's possession, which often implies that this possession has been granted by God and that it will be passed on to the next generation of the new owner
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year
literally: from days to days; hence: = process by which an event is repeated each year
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= town and cult centre, also referred to as Beth Aven (בֵּית אָוֶן) or simply Aven (אָוֶן) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) near the border of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
literally: the rising of the sun: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
literally: to go up; hence: = state in which one side of an area is at a higher elevation than the other
= town and cult centre, also referred to as Beth Aven (בֵּית אָוֶן) or simply Aven (אָוֶן) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) near the border of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) as a town of refuge
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

Node.gloss: to lie in wait|to lay an ambush|to lurk
Node.definition: = to go to a location where one will not be readily seen by others; ► and wait there for an opportunity to seize or attack someone or do something else that is supposed to be done when nobody else can witness it
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= to grasp someone forcibly and suddenly
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans or deities give something to (other) humans out of the kind disposition of their hearts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: to take a wife (for oneself); hence: = action by which a man contracts a marriage with a woman for himself
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
